flexibleContent.heading: Techtic is a top-rated iOS development company with a solid trust to deliver only premium apps for Apple’s marvelous operating system.

contentLists.heading: iOS App Development Consultation
contentLists.content: Start your iOS application development journey with a thorough brainstorming session with subject matter experts to prepare a roadmap to your success.

contentLists.heading: iOS App Development
contentLists.content: Hire iOS app developers who have already dealt with complex projects and are well-versed with Swift and Swift UI to make apps more engaging and superior.

contentLists.heading: iOS User Experience Design
contentLists.content: We create pixel-perfect iOS app UIs while complying with iPhone design guidelines for typography, navigation, UI elements, and more.

contentLists.heading: iPadOS development
contentLists.content: Techtic is a full-blown iOS software development company with iPadOS development professionals to build native iPad apps.

contentLists.heading: IoT app development
contentLists.content: Channeling the power of sensors in the iPhone and blending them with IoT technology, we can build out-of-the-world iOS app solutions.

contentLists.heading: ARKit app development
contentLists.content: We offer an exclusive Augmented reality iOS app development service to let you level up the user experience for hundreds of millions of iPhone and iPad users.

contentLists.heading: App Maintenance & Support
contentLists.content: Great apps require exceptional care and timely upgradation that our iOS app development company ensures with maintenance and support service.

contentLists.heading: Things to Consider before hiring iOS app development company
contentLists.content:
There are lots of factors you need to consider before you hire an expert iOS software development company such as:

  • Check their past project and their portfolio
  • Project completion track record of company
  • Review Client testimonial
  • Check developer’s technical skills and knowledge
  • iOS app development process and many more.

contentLists.heading: Do you code iOS apps in Swift or Objective-C?
contentLists.content: We work on both Swift and Objective-C but the official Apple website claims that Swift is 2.6 times faster than Objective-C. So, we prefer the coding of iOS app in swift because it is more safe, offers quality code and smaller app size.

contentLists.heading: Do the app you make supports the latest version of the iPhone?
contentLists.content: Yes, off course. We’ve built several apps that fully support old and the latest iPhone devices (XR, XS and XS Max).

contentLists.heading: What type of iOS apps you have developed before?
contentLists.content: You can view our app development work at portfolio. Meanwhile, we develop apps like Agohra Delivery App, Shokas, MyBabyQ’s, RelationQuips, Island Guide, HairDime, FITLEAD, etc.

contentLists.heading: Will you help me to upload my iOS app on the Apple App Store?
contentLists.content: Yes, of course. We will help you to upload your iOS app on the Apple App store.

contentLists.heading: Why Should I Choose Techtic for iOS App Development?
contentLists.content: Techtic has a track record of building winning mobile applications for many industries. We have been part of 250 applications and have experts to consult you with the best iOS Application Development solutions for your idea. We are industry leaders for professional and industry-best iPhone application development services because we have highly experienced iOS app developers who can help you realize your vision.

contentLists.heading: What are the different iOS app platforms that you deal in terms of design and development?
contentLists.content:
We deal in below listed design and development frameworks, Tools, and IDEs.

  • iOS App Development Tools & IDEs: 1. Swift, 2. Objective-C, 3. Xcode
  • Mobile Payment Tools: 1. Braintree, 2. Stripe
  • Push Notification Tools: 1. Pusher, 2. Firebase

contentLists.heading: What process do you follow for building an iOS app?
contentLists.content:
Our iOS App Development Process

  • Phase I – Kickoff Meeting
  • Phase II – Project Management & Resource Allocation
  • Phase III – Mockup Design
  • Phase IV – Agile Development – Programming& Quality Assurance
  • Phase VII – Final Deployment

contentLists.heading: How long does it take for you to develop an iOS app?
contentLists.content: On average, iOS app can take around four to eight months to develop. Still it depends totally on the requirements of the project. If you have complex app requirement then it will take more time to complete your iOS app development project and if you have simple app requirement then it will take less time to complete iOS app development project. You can contact us at info@techtic.com or directly get in touch us today for your project requirement.

contentLists.heading: What is the standard iOS application development cost?
contentLists.content: It depends totally on the requirements of the project. You can contact us at info@techtic.com or directly get in touch us today for your iOS project requirement.

contentLists.heading: Do you offer any FREE trial for testing your iOS development?
contentLists.content: Yes, we offer a free trial and an interview before hiring a iOS developer or a team of iOS developers.

contentLists.heading: Will we sign an NDA to keep my iOS app idea confidential?
contentLists.content: Yes, for your security measurement, we will sign NDA.
